name: new-react-folder
description: Create a component folder with matching file names inside

new-react-folder.reactFileFormat.description: Name of file extension to create for react files. Do not include the dot. Example: `jsx`, `js`

new-react-folder.customExtensions.description: A comma seperated list of file extensions to create with folder name, without proceeding dot. Example: `scss,module.css,stories.js`

new-react-folder.includeDefaultContent.description: If checked, default content be added to the react file.
